requirements.text: Create a Zustand-based global state management system with four stores persisted to localStorage: (1) userStore with fields: name, email, gender, ageRange, skinType, skinConcerns, routinePreference, glowPoints, streak, bestStreak, tier, totalRoutinesCompleted, hasCompletedOnboarding; (2) routineStore with todayMorningSteps, todayEveningSteps, history, currentStreak, bestStreak, and actions completeMorningStep(id), completeEveningStep(id), completeFullRoutine(type); (3) shopStore with products array, cart, wishlist, and actions addToCart, removeFromCart, toggleWishlist, checkout; (4) communityStore with posts array, leaderboard array, and likePost(id) action.
